org.diachron.detection.complex_change

Class CCManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diachron.detection.complex_change.CCManager

  • public class CCManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a complex change definitions. Moreover, it contains all the required methods for a definition of a complex change.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CCManager() 
      CCManager(java.util.Properties prop) 
      CCManager(java.util.Properties prop, java.lang.String changesOntologySchema)
      Creates a new instance of CCManager which considers a properties file which contains the Virtuoso credentials and a specific changes ontology schema.

      • isValidCCName

        public boolean isValidCCName(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the given complex change name is valid.
        Parameters:
        name - The complex change name.
        Returns:
        True if the name is valid, false otherwise.

      • addCCParameter

        public boolean addCCParameter(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String scParameter)
        Inserts a new complex change parameter into the current complex change definition. The method also checks if the added parameter has a unique name.
        Parameters:
        name - The complex change parameter name
        scParameter - The simple change parameter name which is associated with the complex change parameter.
        Returns:
        True if the complex change parameter is assigned successfully, false otherwise.

      • addSimpleChange

        public boolean addSimpleChange(SCDefinition change)
        Associates a new simple change definitions with the current comple change definition.
        Parameters:
        change - The simple change to be associated.
        Returns:

      • getSChanges

        public java.util.List<SCDefinition> getSChanges()
        Return a list of all the associated simple changes.
        Returns:

      • insertChangeDefinition

        public CCDefinitionError insertChangeDefinition()
                                         throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Inserts a complex change definition into the changes ontology schema.
        Returns:
        An instance of CCDefinitionError whose ErrorCode is NULL if the complex change is inserted successfully. Otherwise, the ErrorCode denotes the type of the error.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • isValidSPARQL

        public boolean isValidSPARQL()
        Checks if the constructed SPARQL update query, which is responsible for the detection of this complex change, is valid.
        Returns:
        True if the constructed SPARQL update is valid, false otherwise.

      • deleteAllComplexChanges

        public boolean deleteAllComplexChanges(java.lang.String changesOntology,
                              boolean detectedOnly)
        Deletes all the detected complex change instances contained in the changes ontology given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        changesOntology - The complex change which will be examined.
        detectedOnly - A flag which denotes whether only the detected changes of the defined complex changes will be deleted or not.
        Returns:
        True if there was deleted any complex change detection instance, false otherwise.

      • deleteComplexChangeInstWithLessPr

        public boolean deleteComplexChangeInstWithLessPr(java.lang.String changesOntology,
                                        java.lang.String ccName)
        Deletes the detected instances of all with complex changes higher priority value than the complex change given as parameter. This means that these complex changes are less important.
        Parameters:
        changesOntology - The complex change which will be examined.
        ccName - The complex change whose priority is considered.
        Returns:

      • deleteComplexChange

        public boolean deleteComplexChange(java.lang.String changesOntology,
                          java.lang.String ccName,
                          boolean detectedOnly)
        Deletes the detected instances of the complex change with name given as parameter from the changes ontology with name also given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        changesOntology - The changes ontology which contains possible detected instances of the given complex change
        ccName - The name of the complex change.
        detectedOnly - A flag which denotes whether the detected changes of change with name ccName will be deleted (true) or the definition of change as well.
        Returns:
        True if there were found and deleted detected instances of the given complex change, false otherwise.

      • deleteComplexChanges

        public boolean deleteComplexChanges(java.lang.String changesOntology,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> ccNames,
                           boolean detectedOnly)
        Deletes all the detected instances of the complex changes with names given as parameter from the changes ontology with name also given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        changesOntology - The changes ontology which contains possible detected instances of the given complex change
        ccNames - The list of names of the complex changes.
        detectedOnly - A flag which denotes whether the detected changes of change with name ccName will be deleted (true) or the definition of change as well.
        Returns:
        True if there were found and deleted detected instances of at least one of the given complex changes, false otherwise.

      • saveCCExtendedDefinition

        public CCDefinitionError saveCCExtendedDefinition(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.Double priority,
                                         java.lang.String description,
                                         java.util.List<SCDefinition> scDefinitions,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> ccParameters,
                                         java.util.List<VersionFilter> versionFilters)
        Stores a complex change into the ontology of changes.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the complex change.
        priority - The priority of the complex change.
        description -
        scDefinitions - A list of associated complex changes
        ccParameters - A map of complex change parameters which contains the complex change parameter names (as keys) and the optional associated simple change parameter names (as values)
        versionFilters - The list of version filters.
        associations -
        Returns:
        An instance of CCDefinitionError whose ErrorCode is NULL if the complex change is inserted successfully. Otherwise, the ErrorCode denotes the type of the error.

      • groupFiltersPerPresence

        public void groupFiltersPerPresence(java.util.List<VersionFilter> vfilters)
        Groups the given list of version filtes w.r.t. their presence.
        Parameters:
        vfilters - The list of version filters.

        Converts a SPARQL update query into a SPARQL select query. Moreover, the query is stored as a Properties file with all the required meta data.

        scUris -
        Returns:
